ProcessDescription.ows:Title: urn:ogc:def:aggregationProcess:convexHull:spatialMedian:oneContainingTimeRange:temporalMax
ProcessDescription.ows:Abstract: Process to aggregate Observations by different Grouping and Aggregation methods. The Observations can be passed to the process or fetched from a SOS. SpatialPartitioningPredicate: Calculates the convex hull of all given observations and use this polygon as the SamplingFeature of all aggregated observations. SpatialAggregationFunction: Chooses the median of the result values. TemporalPartitioningPredicate: Calculates the time frame of all given observations and use this as the ObservationTime for all aggregated observations. TemporalAggregationFunction: Chooses the maximum result value.

Input.ows:Title: Group By Observed Property
Input.ows:Abstract: Whether the process should group Observations by ObservedProperty.

Input.ows:Title: SOS Destination URL
Input.ows:Abstract: The URL of a Sensor Observation Service, where the output collection should be stored.

Input.ows:Title: SOS Source URL
Input.ows:Abstract: The URL of a Sensor Observation Service. If the SOSRequest input is not present a GET-request will be send. If the ObservationCollection input is present the collections will be merged.

Input.ows:Title: SOS GetObservation Request
Input.ows:Abstract: SOS GetObservation request which will be send to SOSUrl. If the ObservationCollection input is present the collections will be merged.

Output.ows:Title: Aggregated Observations Reference
Output.ows:Abstract: A GetObservation request, which can be send to SOSDestinationUrl to obtain the observation collection.

Output.ows:Title: Aggregated Observations
Output.ows:Abstract: The aggregated Observations in an OM ObservationCollection. The resulting type will be om:Measurement.
